website_summaries.verdict: Art piece that's good enough for show but also functional for everyday use.
pros: Mid-century modern bowl is designed by Wei Young
Made of acacia wood, the 12-inch bowl with 2 servers has flowing lines that makes food look Instagrammable
cons: You need to make your dishes look as good as the bowl

customer_reviews.title: Spoons broke after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at Thanksgiving. I used it with my family, very gently, maybe 4 or 5 times. Tonight at Christmas dinner, the spoon had a piece of wood break off and it ended up in the salad. The bowl is nice, but the spoons seem weird and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rayburn-Zammeillo

customer_reviews.title: GET TO KNOW NAMBE
customer_reviews.text: I have several items from Nambe - no regrets with any purchase I made and this salad bowl is no exception. It is on the large size - great when you have a good size number of people i.e., family gathering, party or get together. It is very easy to clean and the beauty of this bowl is even when left empty, IT LOOKS GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: happyday

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best salad bowl EVER! I’m so happy to have this aesthetically pleasing and functional salad bowl that I keep it on display when not in use....What a fantastically beautiful piece of kitchenware that I’m very proud to own ❤️
customer_reviews.author: mholly99

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought this as a gift and now I want one for myself. It looks like a piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Nambe is a staple of quality. This bowl is beautiful. I don’t care for the shape of the tongs that come with it, but it is a beautiful piece
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Banville

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift to a valued client, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to a valued client, it worked perfectly. She appreciated the gesture and quality of the set, and I retained a client for another year, Beat that!
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this gorgeous salad bowl!! It is perfect, size size and looks just lovely! I bought the smaller bowls to go with it and it makes a beautiful set. Looks so pretty on the table!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Ogulnick

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful salad bowl for a dinner party
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful salad bowl that I bought for my own home. I especially like the servers with their unique design. The size is perfect for a large dinner party. Just need to be sure the salad looks as good as the bowl! This would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The quality and aesthetics of this wooden salad set are stunning. Purchased one as a gift and loved it so much that I bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great piece. We love it
customer_reviews.text: Great piece. We love it. It holds a lot of salad, look great and stays great. You get what you pay, and here your money is well invested.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Grun

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful! I looked for a long time and am so happy. It’s a beautiful high quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s gorgeous and will get a ton of use.
customer_reviews.author: tymom123

customer_reviews.title: Great salad bowl, best one ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great for serving 6 or 8. Easy to clean. Great quality, would make a nice gift!
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Spoons chipped are 4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift used 4x and the spoons are already chipping. Please contact for exchange. I would like new spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: #QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved the quality and style of this salad bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great quality- gave as a wedding shower gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality- gave as a wedding shower gift for my niece along with a set of 4 extra serving bowls. Many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, perfect gift (get one for yourself) - Great piece to your dining fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my niece for wedding gift and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Nambe Harmony Acacia-Wood Salad Bowl with 2 Servers
customer_reviews.text: I love Nambe products and wanted something special for a first anniversary gift. They loved it. Beautiful wood, great size.
customer_reviews.author: sturdy one

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and durable salad dish, it look beautifully on the table. We received lots of compliments about the dish from our guests. It’s also easy to clean and the food don’t get stuck into the bottom seam.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bowl, got everyone's attention at the bridal shower.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift, after seeing it on the Bride's wedding registry. It is just beautiful and something that will last her forever. It is definitely a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Andreasinwa

customer_reviews.title: She's super happy about how deep it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a mother's day gift for my mother after her last wooden bowl vanished at an office cook out. She absolutely loves it. She's super happy about how deep it is, she says it's perfect for guacamole (which is what she used the last bowl for). She thinks it's beautiful. I would absolutely get this again!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hynes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was an anniversary gift for my daughter and son-in-law. Loved by all!
customer_reviews.author: CSL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set and given as a gift. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B. Price

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY TO CLEAN, DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this salad bowl. It's super EASY TO CLEAN! The wood holds no odor which is amazing. Also when I'm not using it as a salad bowl it's a beautiful center piece where I put all my fruit in! This is one of my go to gifts for weddings you can never go wrong with a beautiful salad bowl like this
customer_reviews.author: dominique

customer_reviews.title: Work of Art!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Nambe products because each piece is like a work of art. The quality and craftsmanship is impeccable. A great anytime gift! The compliments won’t stop on your Nambe product. A gorgeous way to showcase cooking.
customer_reviews.author: claudia frost

customer_reviews.title: So pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This set was a gift for our daughter who lives in northern CA. She had mentioned that she wanted a wooden salad bowl and tongs. When she received it, she was taking a salad to a frend's house. She texted me this picture with this comment, "Perfect! I love it"!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara York

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood & design
customer_reviews.text: The salad bowl was wrapped and shipped well. The design of the bowl and the wood that was used is beautiful. It is larger than I expected, but is perfect for a party of 6 or more (or less if your salad is a big part of your meal.) Would make a very nice gift. I enjoy using it with guests - always get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: ShaeW

customer_reviews.title: love the curves
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I had this on my registry and when it arrived I was stunned. the quality, the curves and the style is amazing. It even smelled good. The size is big enough for a party. yes, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lightening

product_meta.title: Nambe Gourmet Harmony 3 Piece Wooden Salad Set
product_meta.description: Color:BrownPull together all your favorite ingredients to make your famous spinach salad or a beautiful fruit salad in this Harmony Salad bowl. The contrast of the deep wood against the bright greens and succulent elements enhances the appeal of your dish for a gourmet experience. The Harmony Salad Set was designed by Wei Young in the midcentury modern style, it features elegant lines and flowing curves done in rich, gorgeous acacia wood making it an instant classic in your kitchen. Paired with the unique tongs it is an unforgettable serving piece. Imagine your favorite restaurant with the incredible foods and imported linens. No expense is spared. Just as no expense was spared in the making of the Harmony Salad Set. Excellent, top quality wood is hand crafted in smooth, flowing shapes for a strong yet alluring dish. Recognized for its award-winning designs for more than 60 years, Nambes commitment to timeless beauty, artistic integrity and uncompromising quality is evident in the brands collection of serve ware, barware, and home decor items. Nambe collaborates with the worlds most esteemed designers to develop products that bring function and style into the home. Package contains (1) Nambe Gourmet Harmony 3 Piece Wooden Salad Set. Mid Century Modern Decor Style. Made of Acacia Wood. Bowl measures 12 inches long X 11.5 inches wide X 6 inches high. Servers measure 12 inches long. Hand wash; dry immediately. Designed by Wei Young.
feature_bullets: GOURMET TASTE AND STYLE: Pull together all your favorite ingredients to make your famous spinach salad or a beautiful fruit salad in this Harmony Salad bowl. The contrast of the deep wood against the bright greens and succulent elements enhances the appeal of your dish for a gourmet experience.

MID CENTURY MODERN: The Harmony Salad Set was designed by Wei Young in the midcentury modern style, it features elegant lines and flowing curves done in rich, gorgeous acacia wood making it an instant classic in your kitchen. Paired with the unique tongs it is an unforgettable serving piece.

FIVE STAR DINING: Imagine your favorite restaurant with the incredible foods and imported linens. No expense is spared. Just as no expense was spared in the making of the Harmony Salad Set. Excellent, top quality wood is hand crafted in smooth, flowing shapes for a strong yet alluring dish.

MUSEUM QUALITY DESIGN: Recognized for its award-winning designs for more than 60 years, Nambes commitment to timeless beauty, artistic integrity and uncompromising quality is evident in the brands collection of serve ware, barware, and home decor items. Nambe collaborates with the worlds most esteemed designers to develop products that bring function and style into the home.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Package contains (1) Nambe Gourmet Harmony 3 Piece Wooden Salad Set. Mid Century Modern Decor Style. Made of Acacia Wood. Bowl measures 12 inches long X 11.5 inches wide X 6 inches high. Servers measure 12 inches long. Hand wash; dry immediately. Designed by Wei Young.
